</span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">Registered as a Technologist (RT) and registered in magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) or registry eligible with completing of registry within 12 months by the American Registry of Radiologic Technologists (ARRT (Radiography). State licensure if required by law. .</span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">\n  <o:p></o:p></span></p> \n<p class=\"MsoListParagraphCxSpLast\" style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt 0.5in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; mso-add-space: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">BLS through the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer with card in-hand before start date.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">&nbsp; </span>BLS or CPR card must be good through sixty days of hire.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">&nbsp; </span>All life support certification cards must be issued by either the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer. (American Red Cross for the Professional Rescuer is only good upon hire and all renewals will need to be through an American Heart Association sanctioned course.)\n  <o:p></o:p></span></p> \n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\"><br></span></b><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; COLOR: black; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">With award-winning hospitals and facilities serving the entire Front Range, University of Colorado Health is the state's largest and most innovative health system. By integrating the strengths of academic medicine with the finest community health care, we're able to push the boundaries of medicine and offer our employees endless career opportunities.</span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\"> <span style=\"COLOR: black\">Here, there are no limits, except those you place on yourself. Everyone is united by their passion for discovery and their commitment to improving patients' lives.</span></span><span style=\"mso-bidi-font-family: Calibri; mso-ascii-font-family: Calibri; mso-hansi-font-family: Calibri\">\n  <o:p></o:p></span></p> \n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">Join Us. Together We Improve lives.\n   <o:p></o:p></span></b></p> \n<p class=\"MsoNormalCxSpLast\" style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">The University of Colorado Health (UCHealth) system recognizes and appreciates the rich array of talents and perspectives that equal employment and diversity can offer our institution.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">&nbsp; </span>As an affirmative action/equal opportunity employer, UCHealth is committed to making all employment decisions based on valid requirements.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">&nbsp; </span>No applicant shall be discriminated against in any terms, conditions or privileges of employment or otherwise be discriminated against because of the individual's race, creed, color, religion, gender, national origin or ancestry, age, mental or physical disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or veteran status.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">&nbsp; </span>UCHealth does not discriminate against any \"qualified applicant with a disability\" as defined under the Americans with Disabilities Act and will make reasonable accommodations, when they do not impose an undue hardship on the organization.\n  <o:p></o:p></span></p> \n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-add-space: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">.\n  <o:p></o:p></span></p> \n<p> </p>"}

</span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;,sans-serif\">Performs basic patient care activities as delegated and supervised by an RN, including but not limited to, monitoring vital signs,&nbsp;taking blood glucose measurements and recording intake and output.</span><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;,sans-serif\">Assists patients&nbsp;with tending to personal care and activities of daily living, including but not limited to, bathing, grooming and eating.</span><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;,sans-serif\">Reports abnormal findings or changes in physical, mental and emotional conditions to nursing staff. </span><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; (American Red Cross for the Professional Rescuer is only good upon hire and all renewals will need to be through an American Heart Association sanctioned course.)</span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;,sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">\n  <o:p></o:p></span></p> \n<p class=\"MsoNormalCxSpMiddle\" style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; mso-add-space: auto; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\"><br style=\"mso-special-character: line-break\"><br style=\"mso-special-character: line-break\">\n   <o:p></o:p></span></b></p> \n<p class=\"MsoNormalCxSpMiddle\" style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">With award-winning hospitals and facilities serving the entire Front Range, University of Colorado Health is the state's largest and most innovative health system. {"actual":"","id":"56a0b856e4b0c1bb93610fb3","key":"<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Elevating the Possibility of U at UCHealth </span></b></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\"></span>&nbsp;</p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">UCHealth is a special place and it requires a special type of person to work here. We are committed to attracting exceptional people who possess a rare combination of talent, drive, and intellectual curiosity. They are the people who naturally gravitate toward our culture, our geography, and our passion for discovery -- ambitious people for whom UCHealth isn't just a career, but an elevated state of mind.</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\"><font size=\"3\" face=\"Times New Roman\"><br></font>Summary - Radiology Assistant</span></b></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\"></span></b>&nbsp;</p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Provides clerical and technical support for the department.</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\"></span></b>&nbsp;</p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Job Duties </span></b></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Transports patients to and from clinical areas and verifies patient identity according to policies and procedures. Assists technologists with preparing patients for procedures.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">&nbsp; </span></span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Assists technologists with filing, delivering and retrieving patient reports, entering data in electronic medical records, matching films to folders, and delivering reports to patient units/physicians.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">&nbsp; </span></span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Performs post-procedural duties including patient discharge, room clean up and restocking supplies. Assists with inventory control. Provides clerical support to the department as necessary.</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Within scope of job, requires critical thinking skills, decisive judgment and the ability to work with minimal supervision. Must be able to work in a fast paced environment, and take appropriate action. Follows Standard Precautions using personal protective equipment as required.<br style=\"mso-special-character: line-break\"><br style=\"mso-special-character: line-break\"></span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; -ms-text-autospace: \"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Requirements</span></b><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\"> </span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\"></span>&nbsp;</p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">High School diploma or GED equivalent.</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Basic Life Support (BLS) through the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer with card in-hand before start date.&nbsp; BLS or CPR card must be good through sixty days of hire.&nbsp; All life support certification cards must be issued by either the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer. (American Red Cross for the Professional Rescuer is only good upon hire and all renewals will need to be through an American Heart Association sanctioned course).</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\"><font size=\"3\" face=\"Times New Roman\"><br></font>Preferred</span></b></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\"></span>&nbsp;</p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Customer Service, Communication, Partnering, Problem-Solving, Change.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">&nbsp; </span>Typing 35 WPM.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">&nbsp; </span>Computer Peripheral Equipment, Fax, Personal Computer, Photocopier.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">&nbsp; </span>Use of medical equipment, including but not limited to: finger stick glucose and creatinine instrument.</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; COLOR: black\">With award-winning hospitals and facilities serving the entire Front Range, University of Colorado Health is the state's largest and most innovative health system. </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">Basic Life Support (BLS) through the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer with card in-hand before start date.&nbsp; BLS or CPR card must be good through sixty days of hire.&nbsp; All life support certification cards must be issued by either the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer. (American Red Cross for the Professional Rescuer is only good upon hire and all renewals will need to be through an American Heart Association sanctioned course).</span></p> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\"><font size=\"3\" face=\"Times New Roman\"><br></font>Preferred</span></b></p> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\"></span>&nbsp;</p> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt 0.5in\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">At least 1 year of experience.</span></p>\n<span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\"> <p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">Elevating the Possibility of U at UCHealth </span></b></p> <p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\"></span></p> <p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">UCHealth is a special place and it requires a special type of person to work here. We are committed to attracting exceptional people who possess a rare combination of talent, drive, and intellectual curiosity. They are the people who naturally gravitate toward our culture, our geography, and our passion for discovery -- ambitious people for whom UCHealth isn't just a career, but an elevated state of mind.</span></p> <p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\"></span>With award-winning hospitals and facilities serving the entire Front Range, University of Colorado Health is the state's largest and most innovative health system. Together We Improve lives.</span></b></p> <p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 1em 0px\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\"></span>&nbsp;</p> <p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 1em 0px\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">The University of Colorado Health (UCHealth) system </span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Arial\">recognizes and appreciates the rich array of talents and perspectives that equal employment and diversity can offer our institution.&nbsp; As an affirmative action/equal opportunity employer, UCHealth is committed to making all employment decisions based on valid requirements.&nbsp; No applicant shall be discriminated against in any terms, conditions or privileges of employment or otherwise be discriminated against because of the individual's race, creed, color, religion, gender, national origin or ancestry, age, mental or physical disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or veteran status.&nbsp; UCHealth does not discriminate against any \"qualified applicant with a disability\" as defined under the Americans with Disabilities Act and will make reasonable accommodations, when they do not impose an undue</span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\"> hardship on the organization.</span></p> <p> </p></span>"}

</span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">Monitors patient condition continually and reports / responds to changes in status and adverse results as appropriate.<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">&nbsp; Must be able to work in a fast-paced environment and take appropriate action.</span></p> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">Requirements</span></b><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\"> </span></p> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">High School diploma or GED.</span></p> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">Basic Life Support (BLS) through the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer with card in-hand before start date.&nbsp; BLS or CPR card must be good through sixty days of hire.&nbsp; All life support certification cards must be issued by either the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer. (American Red Cross for the Professional Rescuer is only good upon hire and all renewals will need to be through an American Heart Association sanctioned course).</span></p> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\"><font size=\"3\" face=\"Times New Roman\"><br></font>Preferred</span></b></p> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\"></span>&nbsp;</p> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">Previous experience in ECG interpretation preferred.</span></p> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt 0.5in\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\"></span>&nbsp;</p> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 1em 0px\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">With award-winning hospitals and facilities serving the entire Front Range, University of Colorado Health is the state's largest and most innovative health system. Together We Improve lives.</span></b></p> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 1em 0px\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\"></span>&nbsp;</p> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 1em 0px\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">The University of Colorado Health (UCHealth) system </span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Arial\">recognizes and appreciates the rich array of talents and perspectives that equal employment and diversity can offer our institution.&nbsp; As an affirmative action/equal opportunity employer, UCHealth is committed to making all employment decisions based on valid requirements.&nbsp; No applicant shall be discriminated against in any terms, conditions or privileges of employment or otherwise be discriminated against because of the individual's race, creed, color, religion, gender, national origin or ancestry, age, mental or physical disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or veteran status.&nbsp; UCHealth does not discriminate against any \"qualified applicant with a disability\" as defined under the Americans with Disabilities Act and will make reasonable accommodations, when they do not impose an undue</span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\"> hardship on the organization.</span></p> \n<p> </p>"}

Educates patient regarding procedures, equipment and exam to ensure patient's understanding and cooperation. </span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">When ordered, prepares and administers contrast media and/or medications within scope of practice. Monitors patient condition continually and reports/responds to changes in status as appropriate. Prepares equipment and supplies. </span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Selects appropriate exposure factors and imaging parameters. Implements safety standards and performs appropriate quality control procedures on equipment. Troubleshoots, resolves, and/or reports equipment malfunctions as necessary. </span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Positions patient and performs imaging procedure(s). Analyzes results and identifies issues with the quality of imaging results. </span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Takes appropriate action to resolve image quality issues, including repositioning patient and repeating procedure. Enters, transmits and reports scan results.</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Within scope of job, requires critical thinking skills, decisive judgment and the ability to work with minimal supervision. Monitors and communicates changes in patient condition. Documents patient care given. </span></p> \n<p style=\"TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in\"><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">Maintains equipment and medical supplies, including reordering, stocking, cleaning, and troubleshooting. Maintains examination areas. </span></p> \n<p style=\"TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in\"><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">Performs administrative or clerical duties as assigned, including filing, reception, scheduling, data entry, and patient registration. </span></p> \n<p style=\"TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt 0.5in\"><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">Within scope of job, requires critical thinking skills, decisive judgment and the ability to work with minimal supervision. Must be able to work in a fast paced environment, and take appropriate action. Follows Standard Precautions using personal protective equipment as required.<br><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">&nbsp;</span></b></span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">Requirements</span></b><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\"> </span></p> \n<p style=\"TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in\"><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">High School diploma or GED. </span></p> \n<p style=\"TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in\"><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">Basic Life Support (BLS) through the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer with card in-hand before start date.&nbsp; BLS or CPR card must be good through sixty days of hire.&nbsp; All life support certification cards must be issued by either the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer. (American Red Cross for the Professional Rescuer is only good upon hire and all renewals will need to be through an American Heart Association sanctioned course).</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\"><font size=\"3\" face=\"Times New Roman\"><br></font>Preferred</span></b></p> \n<p style=\"TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt 0.5in\"><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">Certified or registered as a Medical Assistant (required within 60 days of hire as defined by the Position level requirements).</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt\"><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">With award-winning hospitals and facilities serving the entire Front Range, University of Colorado Health is the state's largest and most innovative health system. By integrating the strengths of academic medicine with the finest community health care, we're able to push the boundaries of medicine and offer our employees endless career opportunities.</span><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial',sans-serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\"> <span style=\"COLOR: black\">Here, there are no limits, except those you place on yourself. {"actual":"","id":"56a0b856e4b0c1bb93610fbd","key":"<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Elevating the Possibility of U at UCHealth </span></b></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\"></span>&nbsp;</p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">UCHealth is a special place and it requires a special type of person to work here. We are committed to attracting exceptional people who possess a rare combination of talent, drive, and intellectual curiosity. They are the people who naturally gravitate toward our culture, our geography, and our passion for discovery -- ambitious people for whom UCHealth isn't just a career, but an elevated state of mind.</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\"><font size=\"3\" face=\"Times New Roman\"><br></font>Summary - MRI Technologist</span></b></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\"></span></b>&nbsp;</p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Performs magnetic resonance imaging in accordance with applicable scope and standards of practice and with the policies, values, and mission of the organization.</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\"></span></b>&nbsp;</p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Job Duties </span></b></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Reviews patient history and physician's orders. Educates patient regarding procedures, equipment and exam to ensure patient's understanding and cooperation. </span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">When ordered, prepares and administers contrast media and/or medications within scope of practice. Monitors patient condition continually and reports/responds to changes in status as appropriate. Prepares equipment and supplies. </span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Selects appropriate exposure factors and imaging parameters. Implements safety standards and performs appropriate quality control procedures on equipment. Troubleshoots, resolves, and/or reports equipment malfunctions as necessary. </span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Positions patient and performs imaging procedure(s). Analyzes results and identifies issues with the quality of imaging results. Takes appropriate action to resolve image quality issues, including repositioning patient and repeating procedure. Enters, transmits and reports scan results.</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Within scope of job, requires critical thinking skills, decisive judgment and the ability to work with minimal supervision. Must be able to work in a fast paced environment, and take appropriate action. Follows Standard Precautions using personal protective equipment as required.</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; -ms-text-autospace: \"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Requirements</span></b><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\"> </span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Graduate of an accredited Radiologic Technologist program.</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Registered as a Technologist (RT) and registered in magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) or registry eligible with completing of registry within 12 months by the American Registry of Radiologic Technologists (ARRT (Radiography). </span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">State licensure if required by law.</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Basic Life Support (BLS) through the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer with card in-hand before start date.&nbsp; BLS or CPR card must be good through sixty days of hire.&nbsp; All life support certification cards must be issued by either the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer. (American Red Cross for the Professional Rescuer is only good upon hire and all renewals will need to be through an American Heart Association sanctioned course).</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\"><font size=\"3\" face=\"Times New Roman\"><br></font></span></b><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; COLOR: black\">With award-winning hospitals and facilities serving the entire Front Range, University of Colorado Health is the state's largest and most innovative health system. By integrating the strengths of academic medicine with the finest community health care, we're able to push the boundaries of medicine and offer our employees endless career opportunities.</span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\"> <span style=\"COLOR: black\">Here, there are no limits, except those you place on yourself. Everyone is united by their passion for discovery and their commitment to improving patients' lives.</span></span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">Join Us. Together We Improve lives.</span></b></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\"></span>&nbsp;</p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 1em 0px; LINE-HEIGHT: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\">The University of Colorado Health (UCHealth) system </span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; mso-fareast-font-family: Arial\">recognizes and appreciates the rich array of talents and perspectives that equal employment and diversity can offer our institution.&nbsp; As an affirmative action/equal opportunity employer, UCHealth is committed to making all employment decisions based on valid requirements.&nbsp; No applicant shall be discriminated against in any terms, conditions or privileges of employment or otherwise be discriminated against because of the individual's race, creed, color, religion, gender, national origin or ancestry, age, mental or physical disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or veteran status.&nbsp; UCHealth does not discriminate against any \"qualified applicant with a disability\" as defined under the Americans with Disabilities Act and will make reasonable accommodations, when they do not impose an undue</span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif\"> hardship on the organization.</span></p> \n<p> </p>"}

</span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif;=\"\" mso-fareast-font-family:\"times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\"\"=\"\">Performs basic patient care activities as delegated and supervised by an RN, including but not limited to, monitoring vital signs,&nbsp;taking blood glucose measurements, and recording intake and output. </span></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; line-height: normal; text-indent: -0.25in;\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:  Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;mso-ansi-language:EN\" lang=\"EN\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">·<span style=\"font:7.0pt \" times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\"\"=\"\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif;=\"\" mso-fareast-font-family:\"times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\"\"=\"\">Assists patients&nbsp;with tending to personal care and activities of daily living, including but not limited to, bathing, grooming and eating. </span></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; line-height: normal; text-indent: -0.25in;\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:  Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;mso-ansi-language:EN\" lang=\"EN\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">·<span style=\"font:7.0pt \" times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\"\"=\"\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif;=\"\" mso-fareast-font-family:\"times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\"\"=\"\">Reports abnormal findings or changes in physical, mental and emotional conditions to nursing staff. </span></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif;=\"\" mso-fareast-font-family:\"times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\"\"=\"\">Assists with keeping unit(s) and patient rooms stocked, clean, and orderly.</span></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 8pt 0.5in; line-height: normal; text-indent: -0.25in;\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:  Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;mso-ansi-language:EN\" lang=\"EN\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">·<span style=\"font:7.0pt \" times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\"\"=\"\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;  font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:\"times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\";=\"\" mso-ansi-language:en\"=\"\" lang=\"EN\">Within scope of job, requires critical thinking skills, decisive judgment and the ability to work with minimal supervision. Must be able to work in a fast paced environment, and take appropriate action. Follows Standard Precautions using personal protective equipment as required.</span></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 8pt; line-height: normal;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:=\"\" \"times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\";mso-ansi-language:en\"=\"\" lang=\"EN\">Requirements:</span></b></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; line-height: normal; text-indent: -0.25in;\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:  Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;mso-ansi-language:EN\" lang=\"EN\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">·<span style=\"font:7.0pt \" times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\"\"=\"\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;  font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:\"times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\";=\"\" mso-ansi-language:en\"=\"\" lang=\"EN\">High School Diploma or GED<span style=\"mso-spacerun:yes\">&nbsp; </span></span></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; line-height: normal; text-indent: -0.25in;\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;  mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">·<span style=\"font:7.0pt \" times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\"\"=\"\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif;=\"\" mso-fareast-font-family:\"times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\"\"=\"\">As determined by the Unit Certification List: Certified as a Nursing Assistant (CNA) - State certification as required by State law or CO EMT/B certification or 1 year of current Nursing Assistant Experience.</span></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt 0.5in; line-height: 115%; text-indent: -0.25in;\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:  Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">·<span style=\"font:7.0pt \" times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\"\"=\"\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;  font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif\"=\"\">Basic Life Support (BLS) through the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer with card in-hand before start date.&nbsp; BLS or CPR card must be good through sixty days of hire.&nbsp; All life support certification cards must be issued by either the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer. (American Red Cross for the Professional Rescuer is only good upon hire and all renewals will need to be through an American Heart Association sanctioned course).</span></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;line-height:107%;font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif\"=\"\">&nbsp;</span></b></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;line-height:107%;font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif\"=\"\">Preferred</span></b></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt 0.5in; line-height: 115%; text-indent: -0.25in;\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:  Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">·<span style=\"font:7.0pt \" times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\"\"=\"\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;  line-height:115%;font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:\"times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\";=\"\" mso-ansi-language:en\"=\"\" lang=\"EN\">3-12 Months direct experience </span><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif;=\"\" mso-fareast-font-family:\"times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\"\"=\"\">acute care and/or long term care, nursing assistant experience preferred.</span></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt 0.5in; line-height: 115%; text-indent: -0.25in;\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:  Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">·<span style=\"font:7.0pt \" times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\"\"=\"\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;  font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif\"=\"\">Nursing Assistant to work with patients on the acute Women and Family inpatient units at Poudre Valley Hospital and Medical Center of the Rockies. This position avails the opportunity to work with patients with a variety of diagnoses and care needs – a good fit for candidates pursuing careers in healthcare.<span style=\"mso-spacerun:yes\">&nbsp; </span>We are looking for candidates with great interpersonal skills, effective communication and flexibility that will work hard to meet the care needs of the patients and nursing staff.</span></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 1em 0px; line-height: normal;\"><b><span style=\"font-size:  10.0pt;font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:\"times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\";=\"\" mso-ansi-language:en\"=\"\" lang=\"EN\">Join Us. Together We Improve lives.</span></b></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 1em 0px; line-height: normal;\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:=\"\" \"times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\";mso-ansi-language:en\"=\"\" lang=\"EN\">The University of Colorado Health (UCHealth) system recognizes and appreciates the rich array of talents and perspectives that equal employment and diversity can offer our institution. As an affirmative action/equal opportunity employer, UCHealth is committed to making all employment decisions based on valid requirements. No applicant shall be discriminated against in any terms, conditions or privileges of employment or otherwise be discriminated against because of the individual's race, creed, color, religion, gender, national origin or ancestry, age, mental or physical disability, sexual orientation, gender variance, genetic information or veteran status. UCHealth does not discriminate against any \"qualified applicant with a disability\" as defined under the Americans with Disabilities Act and will make reasonable accommodations, when they do not impose an undue hardship on the organization.</span></p> \n<p> </p>"}

Must be able to work in a fast paced environment, and take appropriate action. Follows Standard Precautions using personal protective equipment as required.</span></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 8pt; line-height: normal;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:=\"\" \"times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\";mso-ansi-language:en\"=\"\" lang=\"EN\">Requirements:</span></b></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;  font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:\"times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\";=\"\" mso-ansi-language:en\"=\"\" lang=\"EN\">High School Diploma or GED<span style=\"mso-spacerun:yes\">&nbsp; </span></span></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; line-height: normal; text-indent: -0.25in;\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;  mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">·<span style=\"font:7.0pt \" times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\"\"=\"\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;  font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif\"=\"\">Basic Life Support (BLS) through the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer with card in-hand before start date.&nbsp; BLS or CPR card must be good through sixty days of hire.&nbsp; All life support certification cards must be issued by either the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer. (American Red Cross for the Professional Rescuer is only good upon hire and all renewals will need to be through an American Heart Association sanctioned course).</span></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;line-height:107%;font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif\"=\"\">&nbsp;</span></b></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 0pt;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;line-height:107%;font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif\"=\"\">Preferred</span></b></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0in 0in 10pt 0.5in; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;  font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif\"=\"\">Nursing Assistant to work with patients on the acute Women and Family inpatient units at Poudre Valley Hospital and Medical Center of the Rockies. This position avails the opportunity to work with patients with a variety of diagnoses and care needs – a good fit for candidates pursuing careers in healthcare.<span style=\"mso-spacerun:yes\">&nbsp; </span>We are looking for candidates with great interpersonal skills, effective communication and flexibility that will work hard to meet the care needs of the patients and nursing staff.</span></p> \n<p> </p>\n<p style=\"margin: 1em 0px; line-height: normal;\"><b><span style=\"font-size:  10.0pt;font-family:\" arial\",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:\"times=\"\" new=\"\" roman\";=\"\" mso-ansi-language:en\"=\"\" lang=\"EN\">Join Us. As an affirmative action/equal opportunity employer, UCHealth is committed to making all employment decisions based on valid requirements. No applicant shall be discriminated against in any terms, conditions or privileges of employment or otherwise be discriminated against because of the individual's race, creed, color, religion, gender, national origin or ancestry, age, mental or physical disability, sexual orientation, gender variance, genetic information or veteran status. UCHealth does not discriminate against any \"qualified applicant with a disability\" as defined under the Americans with Disabilities Act and will make reasonable accommodations, when they do not impose an undue hardship on the organization.</span></p> \n<p> </p>"}

FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">Under the direction and supervision of a provider or nurse, assists with performing patient care. </span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">Performs basic diagnostic procedures and specimen collection. Monitors and communicates changes in patient condition. Documents patient care given. </span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">Maintains equipment and medical supplies, including reordering, stocking, cleaning, and troubleshooting. Maintains examination areas. </span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">Performs administrative or clerical duties as assigned, including filing, reception, scheduling, data entry, and patient registration. </span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt 0.5in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; -ms-text-autospace: \"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">Within scope of job, requires critical thinking skills, decisive judgment and the ability to work with minimal supervision. Must be able to work in a fast paced environment, and take appropriate action. Follows Standard Precautions using personal protective equipment as required.<br><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">&nbsp;</span></b></span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; -ms-text-autospace: \"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">Requirements</span></b><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\"> </span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">High School diploma or GED. </span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">Basic Life Support (BLS) through the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer with card in-hand before start date.&nbsp; BLS or CPR card must be good through sixty days of hire.&nbsp; All life support certification cards must be issued by either the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer. (American Red Cross for the Professional Rescuer is only good upon hire and all renewals will need to be through an American Heart Association sanctioned course).</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\"><font size=\"3\" face=\"Times New Roman\"><br></font>Preferred</span></b></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt 0.5in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">Certified or registered as a Medical Assistant (required within 60 days of hire as defined by the Position level requirements).</span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; COLOR: black; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">With award-winning hospitals and facilities serving the entire Front Range, University of Colorado Health is the state's largest and most innovative health system. By integrating the strengths of academic medicine with the finest community health care, we're able to push the boundaries of medicine and offer our employees endless career opportunities.</span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\"> <span style=\"COLOR: black\">Here, there are no limits, except those you place on yourself. Everyone is united by their passion for discovery and their commitment to improving patients' lives.</span></span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight: normal\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">Join Us. Together We Improve lives.</span></b></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt\"><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\">The University of Colorado Health (UCHealth) system </span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; mso-fareast-font-family: Arial\">recognizes and appreciates the rich array of talents and perspectives that equal employment and diversity can offer our institution.&nbsp; As an affirmative action/equal opportunity employer, UCHealth is committed to making all employment decisions based on valid requirements.&nbsp; No applicant shall be discriminated against in any terms, conditions or privileges of employment or otherwise be discriminated against because of the individual's race, creed, color, religion, gender, national origin or ancestry, age, mental or physical disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or veteran status.&nbsp; UCHealth does not discriminate against any \"qualified applicant with a disability\" as defined under the Americans with Disabilities Act and will make reasonable accommodations, when they do not impose an undue</span><span style=\"FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: &quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%\"> hardship on the organization.</span></p> \n<p> </p>"}

FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">Performs delegated and ancillary basic nursing skills, including activities of daily living, monitoring of patient condition, body mechanics, providing nutritional support and other activities as appropriate to clinical service, in accordance with hospital standards, nursing standards of care, and policies and procedures.</span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\"> \n   <o:p></o:p></span></li> \n <li style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in\" class=\"MsoNormal\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: #343434; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">May perform skills, within scope of practice for unlicensed assistive personnel. These skills include but are not limited to the collection of specimens, use of specialized equipment, restraint monitoring and patient elimination procedures. Communicates performance of these skills to the patient's Registered Nurse and other members of the care team.</span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\"> \n   <o:p></o:p></span></li> \n <li style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in\" class=\"MsoNormal\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: #343434; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">Performs functional assignments per unit standards of care, including such activities as patient admission and discharge procedures, unit environmental organizational tasks, others as appropriate to service.</span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\"> \n   <o:p></o:p></span></li> \n <li style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in\" class=\"MsoNormal\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: #343434; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">Documents care provided.</span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\"> \n   <o:p></o:p></span></li> \n <li style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in\" class=\"MsoNormal\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: #343434; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">Assists with transport including patients, CSR and lab.</span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">\n   <o:p></o:p></span></li>\n</ul> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto\" class=\"MsoNormal\"><b><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">Requirements</span></b><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">\n  <o:p></o:p></span></p> \n<ul type=\"disc\"> \n <li style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in\" class=\"MsoNormal\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: #343434; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">Completion of High School or GED</span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\"> \n   <o:p></o:p></span></li> \n <li style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in\" class=\"MsoNormal\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: #343434; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">Certification as Nursing Assistant in the State of Colorado</span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">\n   <o:p></o:p></span></li>\n</ul> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt 0.5in; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; tab-stops: list .5in\" class=\"MsoNormal\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol\">· </span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">BLS through the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer with card in-hand before start date. BLS or CPR card must be good through sixty days of hire. All life support certification cards must be issued by either the American Heart Association or the American Red Cross CPR for the Professional Rescuer. (American Red Cross for the Professional Rescuer is only good upon hire and all renewals will need to be through an American Heart Association sanctioned course.)\"\n  <o:p></o:p></span></p> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto\" class=\"MsoNormal\"><b><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">Preferred</span></b><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">\n  <o:p></o:p></span></p> \n<ul type=\"disc\"> \n <li style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l2 level1 lfo3; tab-stops: list .5in\" class=\"MsoNormal\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: #343434; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">Current acute care and/or long term care, nursing assistant experience preferred.</span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">\n   <o:p></o:p></span></li>\n</ul> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto\" class=\"MsoNormal\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">With award-winning hospitals and facilities serving the entire Front Range, University of Colorado Health is the state's largest and most innovative health system. By integrating the strengths of academic medicine with the finest community health care, we're able to push the boundaries of medicine and offer our employees endless career opportunities. Here, there are no limits, except those you place on yourself. Everyone is united by their passion for discovery and their commitment to improving patients' lives.</span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">\n  <o:p></o:p></span></p> \n<p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: normal; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto\" class=\"MsoNormal\"><b><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">Join Us. As an affirmative action/equal opportunity employer, UCHealth is committed to making all employment decisions based on valid requirements. No applicant shall be discriminated against in any terms, conditions or privileges of employment or otherwise be discriminated against because of the individual's race, creed, color, religion, gender, national origin or ancestry, age, mental or physical disability, sexual orientation, gender variance, genetic information or veteran status. UCHealth does not discriminate against any \"qualified applicant with a disability\" as defined under the Americans with Disabilities Act and will make reasonable accommodations, when they do not impose an undue hardship on the organization.</span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'\">\n  <o:p></o:p></span></p> \n<p style=\"MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt\" class=\"MsoNormal\"><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">\n  <o:p>\n   &nbsp;\n  </o:p></span></p> \n<p> </p>"}

mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast\">Performs sonography in accordance with applicable scope and standards of practice and with the policies, </span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast\">values, and mission of the organization.\n    <o:p></o:p></span></p> <p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt\" class=\"MsoNormal\"><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-latin\">\n    <o:p>\n     &nbsp;\n    </o:p></span></p> <p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt\" class=\"MsoNormal\"><span style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-latin\">Job duties \n    <o:p></o:p></span></p> <p style=\"TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; MARGIN: 0.5pt 0in 0pt 0.5in; TEXT-AUTOSPACE: ; mso-layout-grid-align: none; tab-stops: 4.5pt; mso-pagination: none; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; mso-add-space: auto\" class=\"MsoListParagraphCxSpFirst\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast\">May require rotation through the system, outreach areas and be on-call.\n    <o:p></o:p></span></p> <p style=\"TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; MARGIN: 0.5pt 0in 0pt 0.5in; TEXT-AUTOSPACE: ; mso-layout-grid-align: none; tab-stops: 4.5pt; mso-pagination: none; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; mso-add-space: auto\" class=\"MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast\">Perform all diagnostic Ultrasound procedures using appropriate patient protocols, positioning, technique selection, equipment, and supplies.\n    <o:p></o:p></span></p> <p style=\"TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; MARGIN: 0.5pt 0in 0pt 0.5in; TEXT-AUTOSPACE: ; mso-layout-grid-align: none; tab-stops: 4.5pt; mso-pagination: none; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; mso-add-space: auto\" class=\"MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast\">Utilize two patient identifiers, introduce self. Explain procedure to be performed to the patient and/or patient family. \n    <o:p></o:p></span></p> <p style=\"TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; MARGIN: 0.5pt 0in 0pt 0.5in; TEXT-AUTOSPACE: ; mso-layout-grid-align: none; tab-stops: 4.5pt; mso-pagination: none; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; mso-add-space: auto\" class=\"MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast\">Review and confirm provider orders. Consult with Radiologist as necessary.\n    <o:p></o:p></span></p> <p style=\"TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; MARGIN: 0.5pt 0in 0pt 0.5in; TEXT-AUTOSPACE: ; mso-layout-grid-align: none; tab-stops: 4.5pt; mso-pagination: none; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; mso-add-space: auto\" class=\"MsoListParagraphCxSpMiddle\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: Symbol; mso-bidi-font-family: Symbol\"><span style=\"mso-list: Ignore\">·<span style=\"FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast\">Obtain complete pertinent patient history for each procedure.\n    <o:p></o:p></span></p> <p style=\"TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; MARGIN: 0.5pt 0in 0pt 0.5in; TEXT-AUTOSPACE: ; mso-layout-grid-align: none; tab-stops: 4.5pt; mso-pagination: none; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; mso-add-space: auto\" class=\"MsoListParagraphCxSpLast\"><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: Symbol; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-fareast\">Evaluate images for technical quality.\n    <o:p></o:p></span></p> <p style=\"LINE-HEIGHT: 115%; </span></span></span><span style=\"FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial','sans-serif'; COLOR: black; FONT-SIZE: 10pt\">Registered as a Diagnostic Medical Sonographer (RDMS), Vascular Technologist (RVT), or Diagnostic Cardiac Sonographer (RDCS)<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes\">&nbsp;
